parameters: *Ahem*\|\^
Today is a special day. \|We stand here to grant
Honor all those who have successfully completed their
course of study here at the Academy of Magic.
It has been my pleasure to watch each of you reach
your true potential. \|Understand that when you receive
your Honor, \.it is with the full faith and confidence
of the Academy.
I will call you up one by one and grant you your Honor.\.
After you have received it, you are free to leave the
hall.
Elias!
Mari!
Kim!
Daniel!
Sven!
And I see that, \.once again, \.young Delphina, \.or
"Mezatrix" or whatever she's calling herself now, \.has
chosen not to grace us with her presence.
Uh ...\| excuse me headmaster?
Oh, \.good afternoon Sabas. \|I didn't see you there. \.What
can I do for you, boy?
Aren't - \. aren't I getting an Honor today?
Listen, \.Sabas.\| There's no denying that you're
incredibly gifted. \|It's not improbable that one day
you'll be remembered as the greatest healer the world
has ever seen.
But you're just not ready to face the real world.\.
Remember last week, \.with the cat and that fire sprite
the third years accidentally summoned?
Your first instinct was to run and hide. \|If Mari
hadn't come across the scene, \.the situation could
have been much, \.much worse.
You have great power within you. \|You just need to
learn to take initiative.
Begging you pardon, \.Headmaster, \.but could I have a
word?
Sorry for intruding, \.Headmaster, \. but I found this
woman skulking by the entrance to the dormitories.\|
She ran when she caught sight of me.\| I thought it was
best to bring her to you.
Jeez, you don't need to push!
Mezatrix. \|I shouldn't be so surprised. \|I had hoped
that you would have learned your lesson after your last
little outburst. \|What were you up to this time?
I was uh ... \|just hanging around.
This \I[167]\C[1]Cracked Orb\C[0] was in her posession.
This ... \| this is the \I[161]\C[1]Orb of Ultraviolet\C[0]!\|
Look at these cracks! \|What have you done to it!?
I was trying to channel magic through it. \|I guess I
overdid it. \|
\}Sorry.\{
Of all the foolish things you could have done!\| Why
would you damage the Orb? \|Why now!? \|How are we going
to raise crops this winter?
What's so important about this orb?
Oh! \|I forgot you were still here.
The \I[161]\C[1]Orb of Ultraviolet\C[0] is one of the \I[161]\C[1]World Orbs\C[0].\|
Each Orb is a distorted reflection of reality, \.and
allows us to harness the power of an aspect of nature.
The \I[161]\C[1]Orb of Ultraviolet\C[0], \.specifically, channels the
power of sunlight. \|Thanks to the Orb, we can grow some
of the freshest produce the world has ever seen, \.even
in the dead of winter.
Can we fix it?
None at the Academy have the power necessary to restore
the Orb, \.but there might still be a way.
It is said that the sun shines brightest upon the world
at the peak of Ash Mountain, in the heart of the
Blackwind Desert. \|If the Orb were exposed to the light
there, it might be mended.
I've decided. \|Mezatrix, \.you need to clean up your
mistake. \.You will travel to Ash Mountain and mend the
Orb.
What!?
Sabas. \|You need real world experience. \|This is your
chance to prove you deserve to be Honored. \|You will
also go to Ash Mountain.
What!?
You are the two most promising candidates this Academy
has seen in generations. \|But you are both lacking ...\|
something. \|My hope is that the two of you will shore up
each other's weaknesses.
You must not fail in this quest. \|Now, \.it is time
for you to depart. \|The rest is up to you.
Let's get this straight.
You're going to stay out of my way. \|Do what I say,
and don't ask questions. \|Understood?
S-sure. \|No problem.
Let's go. \|We've got a long trip west ahead of us, \.so
we'll stop at the village first to stock up on
supplies.
Keep your thoughts focused first of all upon the now.\|
The future can wait, \.and there's nothing you can do to
change the past.
Don't interrupt me while I'm playing.
